F.A.Q.

Overview

Muilessium is the UI framework created for the fast development of the websites. Simple websites which constitute a significant part of the internet. No SPA. No jQuery. No heavy plugins. Just a number of components and helpers - all that you need to develop a website. It has a REM-based sizes system for non-designers and a simple scheme of usage: Sketch → Construct → Paint → Use.

Muilessium on GitHub

CDN
JS CSS

Grid
/src/less/components/grid-flex.less

Muilessium uses a grid with 12 columns based on flexbox (and has a legacy version based on floats, but only in custom builds). Rows and columns have classes .mui-row and .mui-column and columns can have options -s* for a small screen, -m* for a medium screen and -l* for a large screen. Default breakpoints are 400, 600 and 1200px. Its behavior is similar to the grid from flexboxgrid.com, but it uses RSCSS-style class names.

-s1
-s11
-s3
-s9
-s6 -m4 -l6
-s6 -m8 -l6
-m6 -l2
-m6 -l10
<div class='mui-row'>
    <div class='mui-column -s1'>-s1</div>
    <div class='mui-column -s11'>-s11</div>
</div>
<div class='mui-row'>
    <div class='mui-column -s3'>-s3</div>
    <div class='mui-column -s9'>-s9</div>
</div>
<div class='mui-row'>
    <div class='mui-column -s6 -m4 -l6'>-s6 -m4 -l6</div>
    <div class='mui-column -s6 -m8 -l6'>-s6 -m8 -l6</div>
</div>
<div class='mui-row'>
    <div class='mui-column -m6 -l2'>-m6 -l2</div>
    <div class='mui-column -m6 -l10'>-m6 -l10</div>
</div>

Page layout

The basic page layout includes header, page container and footer. This layout is the simplest way to create a sticky footer, but IE11 does not support flexbox greatly, so we have some incorrect behavior in it.

<div class='mui-scroll-fix'></div>
<header class='mui-page-header'>header</header>
<div class='mui-page-container'>...</div>
<footer class='mui-page-footer'>footer</footer>

Recommended viewport

Muilessium uses Hammer.js, and it is recommended to use the following meta in your pages:

<meta name='viewport' content='user-scalable=no, width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1'>

Typography
/src/less/fonts.less

Typography in Muilessium is fluid, and it is based on default system fonts and _bigger-* and _smaller-* helpers. Note: these helpers have different behavior on different screen sizes to avoid troubles with readability.

H1 Heading (+5)
H2 Heading (+4)
H3 Heading (+3)
H4 Heading (+2)
H5 Heading (+1)
H6 Heading (+0)
Normal text
Text (-1)
Text (-2)
Text (-3)
Text (-4)
Text (-5)

Colors
/src/less/colors.less

A number of classes for painting. There are four types of classes:

  • -color-number - text color for the element
  • -color-number-bg - background for the element
  • -f-color-number - text color for the :hover and :focus states of the element
  • -f-color-number-bg - background color for the :hover and :focus states
White
Grey 1-5
Black
Brown 1-5
Orange 1-5
Yellow 1-5
Red 1-5
Purple 1-5
Violet 1-5
Blue 1-5
Light blue 1-5
Cyan 1-5
Green 1-5

Helpers
/src/less/helpers.less

Muilessium has a lot of CSS helpers, no need to add description for every of them. Only helpers can include the "!important" rules.

Global Variables
/src/js/muilessium.js

Muilessium has only one global entry point - window.Muilessium. It has a number of useful fields:

  • EVENTS - the events observer
  • STORE - global store for data
  • FACTORY - the main factory of components
  • KEYBOARD, MOUSE, TOUCHPAD - a number of utilities for controls
  • UTILS - a number of useful utilities
  • POLYFILLS - a number of polyfills for internal usage
Here is an example of usage of UTILS, EVENTS and STORE
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    let _      = window.Muilessium.UTILS,
        STORE  = window.Muilessium.STORE,
        EVENTS = window.Muilessium.EVENTS;

    EVENTS.addEvent('data-updated.post-data');
    
    // ... in the first module

    EVENTS.addEventListener('data-updated.post-data', () => {
        console.log(STORE.get('post-data'));
    });
    
    // ... in the second module
    
    _.ajax.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1', (responseText) => {
        STORE.set('post-data', responseText);
        EVENTS.fireEvent('data-updated.post-data');
    }, (status, statusText) => {
        console.log(`${status} - ${statusText}`);
    });
});

Events
/src/js/events.js

Muilessium has a system of internal events. It exports that system as Muilessium.EVENTS. The main methods are:

  • addEvent(name)
  • addEventListener(name, callback, executeIfAlreadyFired=false)
  • fireEvent(name)

There are six default events:

  1. resize-window-height
  2. resize-window-width
  3. scroll-start
  4. scroll-end
  5. app-initialized
  6. images-loaded

Store
/src/js/store.js

Muilessium has a global store. It should be used to store different data and share it between components. Muilessium exports the store as Muilessium.STORE. The main methods are:

  • set(path, data)
  • get(path)

Factory
/src/js/factory.js

Muilessium has a factory of components. It exports that system as Muilessium.FACTORY. The main methods are:

  • registerComponent(type, component)
  • create(type, selector, options)

Controls
/src/js/controls/*.js

Muilessium has a number of handy utilities for controls. It exports them as Muilessium.KEYBOARD, Muilessium.MOUSE and Muilessium.TOUCHPAD.

Utils
/src/js/utils.js

Muilessium exports over 60 internal utilities as Muilessium.UTILS. In the source code they are separated by categories:

  • AJAX
  • Animations
  • WAI-ARIA
  • HTML attributes
  • Checking
  • CSS classes
  • Focus & click
  • Scroll
  • Viewport
  • Uncategorized

Lazy loading images
/src/js/utils/uncategorized.js
<img class='mui-image -js-lazy-load'
    data-src='....'
    data-srcset='....'
    data-sizes='....'
    alt='Lazy loaded image'
    src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7'>

Icons
/src/less/components/svg-icon.less

Muilessium uses Ionicons by default. You should put the following sprite at the end of your pages. You can create custom icons by replacing symbols in this SVG.


<div class='mui-svg-sprite'>
    <svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

    </svg>
</div>

Components

Muilessium has a number of components listed below. Every component has a markup shown in example and this markup should be used as is, because some initializations of components are based on their markups. All components are stored in Muilessium.FACTORY.componentsCache. If the main element of such component has an ID, the component can be obtained using Muilessium.get(componentName, id).

Accordion
../../src/less/components/accordion.less
[[ Accordion ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Accordion', id) to get it.
  • foldItem(index) - folds item with selected index
  • foldAllItems() - folds all items
  • unfoldItem(index) - unfolds item with selected index
  • unfoldAllItems() - unfolds all items
  • toggleItem(index) - unfolds item with selected index if it is folded and folds it otherwise
  • Lorem
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Porro, quaerat!
  • Lorem
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Porro, quaerat!
Source code
  <ul class='mui-accordion'>
      <li class='item'>
          <div class='title'>
              <div class='indicator'>
                  <svg class='mui-svg-icon -black'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--arrow-right'></use></svg>
              </div>
              <span>Lorem</span>
          </div>
          <div class='content'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Porro, quaerat!</div>
      </li>
      <li class='item'>
          <div class='title'>
              <div class='indicator'>
                  <svg class='mui-svg-icon -black'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--arrow-right'></use></svg>
              </div>
              <span>Lorem</span>
          </div>
          <div class='content'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Porro, quaerat!</div>
      </li>
  </ul>

  <span class='mui-badge -new'          aria-label='5 items total'>5</span>
  <span class='mui-badge -new -rounded' aria-label='5 items total'>5</span>

category subcategory title

      <a class='link' href='' aria-label='Category C'>category</a>
      <a class='link' href='' aria-label='Subcategory S'>subcategory</a>
      <a class='link' href='' aria-label='This product T'>title</a>
  </div>

ButtonDropdown
../../src/less/components/button-dropdown.less
[[ ButtonDropdown ]] - Use Muilessium.get('ButtonDropdown', id) to get it.
  • openDropdown() - opens dropdown menu
  • closeDropdown() - closes dropdown menu
  • toggleDropdown() - opens dropdown menu if it is closed and closes it otherwise
Depends on button
Depends on dropdown-options
Depends on shadow-toggle

Option 2
Option 3
Option 4

Option 9

      </a>

          <div class='wrapper'>
              <div class='mui-custom-scroll'>

  </div>

Button
../../src/less/components/button.less

Button can include an icon, a badge or a label. Buttons can be used in more complex components like button-groups.

button button button button button button ∗ button ∗ button 5 button 5 button label button label

  <a class='mui-button -ghost'        aria-label=''>button</a>
  <a class='mui-button -ghost -light' aria-label=''>button</a>

      <span>∗</span>
      <span>button</span>
  </a>

      <span>∗</span>
  </a>

      <span>button</span>

Card
../../src/less/components/card.less

It is desirable to wrap card header text into h2-h6 tags for better navigation.

Lorem ipsum

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nesciunt, magni.

Source code
  <div class='mui-card _shadow-1'>
      <div class='header'>
          <h5>Lorem ipsum</h5>
      </div>
      <div class='content'>
          <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nesciunt, magni.</p>
      </div>
  </div>

Card
../../src/less/components/card.less

Same card, but with an image instead of traditional header. If an image used here only for presentation purposes, role='presentation' should be added to it manually.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nesciunt, magni.

Source code
  <div class='mui-card -with-image _shadow-1'>
      <div class='header'>
          <img class='mui-image -js-lazy-load' data-src='https://placehold.it/800x600' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7' alt='Card header'>
      </div>
      <div class='content'>
          <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nesciunt, magni.</p>
      </div>
  </div>

Carousel
../../src/less/components/carousel.less

Interval in seconds can be setted using data-attribute.

[[ Carousel ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Carousel', id) to get it.
  • startRotation() - starts rotation
  • stopRotation() - stops rotation
  • rotate(param) - rotates carousel to the selected slide ('next', 'prev' or selected by numerical index)
  • 1. Lorem ipsum dolor.
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Minus, ipsa.
  • 2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellendus, illo.
  • 3. Lorem ipsum dolor sit.
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Ea, aliquam.
Source code
      <div class='mui-carousel' data-interval='4s'>
          <ul class='mui-slides'>
              <li class='mui-slide'>
                  <img class='mui-image background -js-lazy-load' data-src='https://placehold.it/1200x800' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7' alt=''>
                  <div class='mui-slide-content -center'>
                      <div class='title'>1. Lorem ipsum dolor.</div>
                      <div class='text'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Minus, ipsa.</div>
                  </div>
              </li>
              <li class='mui-slide'>
                  <img class='mui-image background -js-lazy-load' data-src='https://placehold.it/1200x800' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7' alt=''>
                  <div class='mui-slide-content -content-left'>
                      <div class='title'>2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.</div>
                      <div class='text'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellendus, illo.</div>
                  </div>
              </li>
              <li class='mui-slide'>
                  <img class='mui-image background -js-lazy-load' data-src='https://placehold.it/1200x800' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7' alt=''>
                  <div class='mui-slide-content -content-right'>
                      <div class='title'>3. Lorem ipsum dolor sit.</div>
                      <div class='text'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Ea, aliquam.</div>
                  </div>
              </li>
          </ul>
          <div class='mui-carousel-controls'>
              <div class='prev'>
                  <svg class='mui-svg-icon -white'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--arrow-left'></use></svg>
              </div>
              <div class='next'>
                  <svg class='mui-svg-icon -white'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--arrow-right'></use></svg>
              </div>
          </div>
          <ul class='mui-carousel-indicators'>
              <li class='indicator'></li>
              <li class='indicator'></li>
              <li class='indicator'></li>
          </ul>
      </div>

Checkbox
../../src/less/components/checkbox.less
[[ Checkbox ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Checkbox', id) to get it.
  • setCheckbox() - sets checkbox checked
  • unsetCheckbox() - sets checkbox unchecked
  • toggleCheckbox() - sets checkbox checked if it is unchecked and sets it unchecked otherwise
  • getState() - returns true if checkbox is checked and false otherwise
Source code
  <div class='mui-checkbox'>
      <input type='checkbox' id='dFrp7'>
      <label>
          <span class='icon'>
              <span class='symbol'>
                  <svg class='mui-svg-icon -black'><use xlink:href="#svg-icon--check"></use></svg>
              </span>
          </span>
          <span class='text'>Lorem ipsum.</span>
      </label>
  </div>

Toggle checkbox
../../src/less/components/checkbox.less

Toggle variation of the checkbox component.

[[ Checkbox ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Checkbox', id) to get it.
  • setCheckbox() - sets checkbox checked
  • unsetCheckbox() - sets checkbox unchecked
  • toggleCheckbox() - sets checkbox checked if it is unchecked and sets it unchecked otherwise
  • getState() - returns true if checkbox is checked and false otherwise
Source code
  <div class='mui-checkbox -toggle'>
      <input type='checkbox' id='qW30v'>
      <label>
          <span class='icon'></span>
          <span class='text'>Lorem ipsum.</span>
      </label>
  </div>

../../src/less/components/collection.less

Can be used with badges.

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
    1024
  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
    14
Source code
  <ul class='mui-collection'>
      <li class='item'>
          <div class='content'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</div>
          <div class='badge'>
              <span class='mui-badge'>2</span>
          </div>
      </li>
      <li class='item'>
          <div class='content'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.</div>
          <div class='badge'>
              <span class='mui-badge'>1024</span>
          </div>
      </li>
      <li class='item'>
          <div class='content'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</div>
          <div class='badge'>
              <span class='mui-badge'>14</span>
          </div>

Input
../../src/less/components/input.less

Has two parameters: regexp (/^(?:)$/ by default) and validation-delay (300ms by defaut). Use -js-no-validation class on mui-input to create input without validation. Use -js-allow-not-exists to hide console warnings when labels or hints are not present.

[[ Input ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Input', id) to get it.
  • validate() - validates input
  • isValid() - returns true if the input value is valid and false otherwise
  • getValue() - returns input value
Select Your username (min 3 characters, only letters allowed) ✓ ✗
Source code
  <div class='mui-input-wrapper'>
      <label class='mui-input-label'>Username</label>
      <div class='mui-input-hint'>
          <span>Select Your username (min 3 characters, only letters allowed)</span>
          <span class='mui-input-indicator'>
              <span class='valid-icon'>✓</span>
              <span class='invalid-icon'>✗</span>
          </span>
      </div>
      <div class='mui-input' data-regexp='^[a-zA-Z]{3,}$' data-validation-delay='1000'>
          <input type='text' id='lUDbS' placeholder='Select your username'>
      </div>
  </div>

Header navigation
../../src/less/components/page-header-navigation.less
[[ HeaderNavigation ]] - Use Muilessium.get('HeaderNavigation', id) to get it.
  • openNavigation() - opens mobile navigation
  • closeNavigation() - closes mobile navigation
  • toggleNavigation() - opens mobile navigation if it is closed and closes it otherwise
  • transformToMobile() - transforms navigation to mobile version
  • transformToDesktop() - transforms navigation to desktop version
Depends on page-header
Depends on shadow-toggle
  • home
  • about
  • contacts
Source code
  <nav class='mui-header-navigation -mobile-version'>
      <div class='mui-navigation-toggle -hamburger' aria-label='Main website navigation'>
          <svg class='mui-svg-icon'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--hamburger'></use></svg>
      </div>
      <ul class='links-list'>
          <li class='item'><a class='link' href='' aria-label='Home page'>home</a></li>
          <li class='item'><a class='link' href='' aria-label='Page about me'>about</a></li>
          <li class='item'><a class='link' href='' aria-label='Page with my contacts'>contacts</a></li>
      </ul>
      <div class='mui-navigation-toggle mui-shadow-toggle'></div>
  </nav>

Progress bar
../../src/less/components/progress-bar.less

Progress bar component

[[ ProgressBar ]] - Use Muilessium.get('ProgressBar', id) to get it.
  • setValue(newValue) - sets new value and animates the progress bar
  • getValue() - returns current value of the progress bar

      <div class='indicator'></div>

Select dropdown
../../src/less/components/select-dropdown.less

Data-id attribute should be used to select id and name attributes for the hidden html select element. Should be used with label for better accessibility.

[[ SelectDropdown ]] - Use Muilessium.get('SelectDropdown', id) to get it.
  • getSelectedIndex() - returns index of the selected item
  • openDropdown() - opens dropdown menu
  • closeDropdown() - closes dropdown menu
  • toggleDropdown() - opens dropdown menu if it is closed and closes it otherwise
  • updateState(newIndex = 0) - selects item with selected index
  • getState() - returns index of the selected item
Depends on input
Depends on dropdown-options
Depends on shadow-toggle
Red
Green
Blue
Orange
Source code
  <div class='mui-input-wrapper'>
      <label class='mui-input-label'>Select color</label>
      <div class='mui-select-dropdown'>
          <div class='select' data-id='fGrt3'>
              <div class='state'></div>
              <div class='mui-dropdown-options _shadow-1'>
                  <div class='wrapper'>
                      <div class='mui-custom-scroll'>
                          <div class='option -selected' data-value='red'>Red</div>
                          <div class='option' data-value='green'>Green</div>
                          <div class='option' data-value='blue'>Blue</div>
                          <div class='option' data-value='orange'>Orange</div>
                      </div>
                  </div>
              </div>
          </div>
          <div class='mui-shadow-toggle'></div>
          <div class='icon'>
              <svg class='mui-svg-icon -white'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--arrow-down'></use></svg>
          </div>
      </div>
  </div>

Sunt ad eligendi numquam cupiditate asperiores quod, aspernatur delectus labore est? Nisi sapiente, doloremque cupiditate vel eos numquam aliquam possimus? Tags list
../../src/less/components/tags-list.less
nature
art
photography
mountains
sea
Source code
      <div class='mui-tags-list' aria-label='Tags list'>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper -icon' role='presentation'>
              <svg class='mui-svg-icon'><use xlink:href='#svg-icon--tags'></use></svg>
          </div>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag nature'>nature</a></div>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag art'>art</a></div>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag photography'>photography</a></div>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag mountains'>mountains</a></div>
          <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag sea'>sea</a></div>
      </div>

Variation of the tags list component. Should be initialized too.

nature

Source code
  <div class='mui-tags-list -solid' aria-label='Tags list'>
      <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag nature'>nature</a></div>
      <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag art'>art</a></div>
      <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag photography'>photography</a></div>
      <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag mountains'>mountains</a></div>
      <div class='mui-tag-wrapper'><a href='' class='mui-tag' aria-label='Search by tag sea'>sea</a></div>
  </div>

Textarea
../../src/less/components/textarea.less

Label should be used for better accessibility.

[[ Textarea ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Textarea', id) to get it.
  • getValue() - returns the value of the textarea
Depends on input
Source code
  <div class='mui-input-wrapper'>
      <label class='mui-input-label'>Your message</label>
      <div class='mui-textarea'>   
          <textarea id='fmVs1' placeholder='Print your message here'></textarea>
      </div>
  </div>

Material textarea
../../src/less/components/textarea.less

Textarea component (material-style variation)

[[ Textarea ]] - Use Muilessium.get('Textarea', id) to get it.
  • getValue() - returns the value of the textarea
Source code
  <div class='mui-input-wrapper'>
      <div class='mui-textarea -material'>   
          <textarea id='0zx6R'></textarea>
          <label class='mui-input-label'>Your text</label>
      </div>
  </div>

F.A.Q.
Can I use Muilessium in my project?
Yes, Muilessium is distributed under the MIT license, so You can use it in Your projects.
What browsers are supported?
All modern browsers, including IE11.
What can I do if I found a bug?
If you found a bug - don't worry, Muilessium is in pre-pre-release state and can have some bugs, You can open an issue on GitHub or send me an email and I will fix a problem.
Copyright © Ivan Bogachev, 2016-2017
